Action.author: techwritingwhiz
Action.body: I've previously added these instructions to the main documentation – the PDF called "Working with Nodes and Clients." I will take the changes you made to the document you changed and update the main document. Other than that, I do not know of any other installation instructions somewhere else. I am not definitive answer on that one though. :)

Action.author: techwritingwhiz
Action.body: The PDF and HTML versions of this information has now been updated with the changes noted in the google doc referenced. The new version of the official PDF is located here: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/0B4efUY1IocYwUERNNW5sekNTMUU. Please review this for accuracy. If it is accurate, we may close out this ticket.

Action.author: krw910
Action.body: I have checked the documents and it all looks good.
